analyzed: gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma bzhugs

analyzed: rgya gar skad du

analyzed: bo d+hi tsit+ta rat+na gu h+ya tsit+ta pra d+h+ai sam n+aa ma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rin po che gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma zhes byed ba

analyzed: joms ldan da dpal rang gsal ma chos lhun gyis gnas ba ngang du phyag tshal lo

original: rgyal bas mkhyen snang dus drug bskul sprul brdar //
analyzed: rgyal ba mkhyen snang dus drug skul sprul rdar

analyzed: jig rten mun sel yang sprul nyi ma char

original: de yi gsung bzhin blor bzhag gsal bar bstan //
analyzed: de yi gsung bzhin blor jog gsal ba ston

analyzed: kun snang der rtogs mtshon med byung gzhir gnas

analyzed: de rtogs khrul ba myang da khor ba gyur

original: kun gyi rgyur gyur 'byung ba bzhi las ltar //
analyzed: kun gyi rgyur gyur byung ba bzhi las ltar

original: ma rtogs gzung 'dzin rnam rtog grangs mtha' yas //
analyzed: ma rtogs gzung dzin rnam rtogs grangs mtha yas

analyzed: rjes rtogs rtog snang rang kar spyod ba khor

analyzed: bdag dzin nyon mongs dbang gis rtogs don joms

analyzed: las dbang rgyal ba thugs rjes don mthar son

analyzed: sbrul mdud gnas skabs gcig gis de rig gyur

analyzed: de srid stong snang bdag med gshis su grol

analyzed: theg chung tha dad bras bur brod skur tsam

analyzed: phyi nang mthon dman don la med ba rdzogs

analyzed: snying po rnal ma gsang du ub chub ste

analyzed: gsal snang rtogs med spros bral lhun grub ngang

analyzed: nyi bzhin gsal snang kun gyis mtshon du med

analyzed: bde ba chen po stong nyid spros dang bral

analyzed: snang bzhin stong ba dngos por ston du med

analyzed: dbyer med gcig gi ngang du rtogs ba mdzod

analyzed: yid sbyin nor bu mchod skur rten bkur dra

analyzed: phyogs su ma lhungs rgyar ma chad ba ngang

analyzed: rtse gcig ma yengs don rtogs goms ba jog

analyzed: kye dge slong rang gsal dbyer med yon tan bsam las da

original: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra ba ta dang / bod kyi lo ts+aa ba slob dpon chen po bee ro tsa nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la babs pa////
